page.title: 09PLANT NURSERY
page.content: Mr. Clutton, the manager of the nursery, has owned it for 15 years.He handles 2,000 types of plants. Also he keeps a pony called Honey.Mr.and Mrs Clutton live in a semi-detached house next to their family business. He has one small unheated green house 5 by3 metres. Mr.Clutton's best plant is a little green plant with purple flower called Hebe, but his best seller is Leylandii.The trade is seasonal, peaking around Christmas, Easterand Mother's Day .He sells about Â£1000 worth of plants a week and gets 35% of his custom in the week and 65% at the weekend.He stocks, at any one time, 200types of plant including 30climbers In Autumn and Winter he sells deciduous trees and shrubs Mr.&Mrs. Clutton buy in all their stock,and even import plants from Holland, Guernsey and France.
